body_html:
Would it be possible to improve the error messaging to give developers more guidance?

For example, if the cuDNN DLL isn't found, the error message could recommend installing the version 5.1 and adding its bin/ directory to the system path.
body_text:
Would it be possible to improve the error messaging to give developers more guidance?
For example, if the cuDNN DLL isn't found, the error message could recommend installing the version 5.1 and adding its bin/ directory to the system path.
body:
Would it be possible to improve the error messaging to give developers more guidance?

For example, if the cuDNN DLL isn't found, the error message could recommend installing the version 5.1 and adding its bin/ directory to the system path.
